function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Quarantine-induced reduction in physical activity energy expenditure","Impact":"Negative impact on psychological well-being","Mitigation":"Encouraging and promoting regular physical activity","Technologies":"Mobile apps for at-home workouts, virtual fitness classes","People":"Individuals of all age groups","Owner":"Health and wellness organizations"},{"Description":"Impact of stay-at-home on physical and mental health","Impact":"Potential increase in depression, anxiety, and stress","Mitigation":"Providing resources for at-home exercise, mental health support services","Technologies":"Telemedicine for mental health counseling, online fitness platforms","People":"General public","Owner":"Healthcare providers, mental health organizations"},{"Description":"Demographic breakdown of study participants","Impact":"None identified","Mitigation":"Not applicable","Technologies":"Not applicable","People":"Study participants","Owner":"Research institution"}]}
